info.name: ThreeDTilesViewer
info.summary: View Three Tiles files directly in Nextcloud
info.description:
Three Tiles Viewer for Nextcloud
A Nextcloud app that allows users to view Three Tiles files directly within their Nextcloud instance using an interactive three viewer. PLEASE NOTE: currently only tested with metashape cesium one.one tiles. Features
File Browser Integration: Browse and select tileset.json files from your Nextcloud storage Interactive Three Viewer: Full-featured three viewer with camera controls, lighting, and model manipulation Mobile Support: Responsive design that works on desktop and mobile devices Permission Integration: Respects Nextcloud's file sharing and permission system User Settings: Store viewer preferences per user WGS84 Coordinate System: Support for geographic coordinate systems KTX2/DRACO Support: Advanced texture and geometry compression
info.author: Mark Z Segec
